sourcesContent:
Welcome to Our Accessible Website

Key Features

Accessible Navigation

Fully keyboard-accessible navigation with ARIA labels and skip links.

Semantic HTML

Properly structured content using semantic HTML elements.

Responsive Design

Fully responsive layout that works on all device sizes.

Featured Products

Ergonomic Keyboard

Enhanced visibility and comfort for extended use

$89

Adaptive Mouse

Customizable buttons and smooth tracking

$65

Shopping Cart

  • {{item.name}}

    ${{item.price}}

    {{item.quantity}}

Total: ${{cartTotal}}

Your cart is empty

Get Started

Interactive Dropdown Example

  • Option 1
  • Option 2
  • Option 3
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; interface CartItem { id: string; name: string; price: number; quantity: number; image: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { isDropdownOpen = false; selectedOption = ''; cartItems: CartItem[] = []; constructor(private router: Router) {} get cartTotal(): number { return this.cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + (item.price * item.quantity), 0); } addToCart(productId: string): void { const productMap = { keyboard: { id: 'keyboard', name: 'Ergonomic Keyboard', price: 89, image: 'assets/images/product1.jpg' }, mouse: { id: 'mouse', name: 'Adaptive Mouse', price: 65, image: 'assets/images/product2.jpg' } }; const product = productMap[productId]; const existingItem = this.cartItems.find(item => item.id === productId); if (existingItem) { existingItem.quantity += 1; } else { this.cartItems.push({ ...product, quantity: 1 }); } // Announce to screen readers this.announceToScreenReader(`Added ${product.name} to cart`); } removeFromCart(item: CartItem): void { const index = this.cartItems.indexOf(item); if (index > -1) { this.cartItems.splice(index, 1); this.announceToScreenReader(`Removed ${item.name} from cart`); } } increaseQuantity(item: CartItem): void { item.quantity += 1; this.announceToScreenReader(`Increased quantity of ${item.name} to ${item.quantity}`); } decreaseQuantity(item: CartItem): void { if (item.quantity > 1) { item.quantity -= 1; this.announceToScreenReader(`Decreased quantity of ${item.name} to ${item.quantity}`); } } checkout(): void { // Implement checkout logic alert('Proceeding to checkout...'); } navigateToProducts(): void { this.router.navigate(['/products']); } toggleDropdown(): void { this.isDropdownOpen = !this.isDropdownOpen; } selectOption(option: string): void { this.selectedOption = option; this.isDropdownOpen = false; // Announce selection to screen readers const announcement = document.createElement('div'); announcement.setAttribute('aria-live', 'polite'); announcement.textContent = `Selected option: ${option}`; document.body.appendChild(announcement); setTimeout(() => document.body.removeChild(announcement), 1000); } private announceToScreenReader(message: string): void { const announcement = document.createElement('div'); announcement.setAttribute('aria-live', 'polite'); announcement.setAttribute('class', 'sr-only'); announcement.textContent = message; document.body.appendChild(announcement); setTimeout(() => document.body.removeChild(announcement), 1000); } // Close dropdown when clicking outside onDocumentClick(event: MouseEvent): void { if (!(event.target as HTMLElement).closest('.custom-dropdown')) { this.isDropdownOpen = false; } } }
